colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @047A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI LUNG DANG MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I YON TAN GYIS PHYUG PA KOD PO MKHAN CHEN SKU [?] YE SHES BSTAN SGRON GYIS KHA BTAGS BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB MA DANG BCAS NAN GYIS BSKUL ZHING RANG NYID KYANG RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO'I RNAM THAR LA MCHOG TU DAD PAS RKYEN BYAS NAS RI KHROD PA NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA ZHES PAS MKHAS GRUB SMRA BA'I KHYU MCHOG GIS RNAM THAR DAD PA'I 'JUG NGOGS SU GSUNGS PA RNAMS LA GZHI BYAS TE [?] TU LCOG BYANG CHUB GLING DU BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG ^RJE RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSHAD SGRUB KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS KUN TU RGYAS PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
